attributes.review: I was using the app while laying down on my bed, but I dropped my phone and it shattered my ribcage, puncturing my lungs! Would rate 0 stars!
attributes.title: This app gave me permanent lung damage!

attributes.review: imagine actually supporting someone who doesn’t take their job seriously but wait they’re the president of the united states:/

attributes.review: This app is one of the scariest😱 apps I’ve ever downloaded. As soon as I opened it my phone📞 caught on fire🔥 and my dog 🐶 DIED 🥺Please do not use this app I’m scared that I am now haunted 👻for the rest of my life⏳
attributes.title: DISGUSTANG💩😝

attributes.review: I was really expecting great things out of this app. Thoroughly disappointed with what the president came up with. Better luck next time😉
attributes.title: Dump Trump

attributes.review: Nothing works on this app — it kept crashing and I was left on a black screen. The app is almost as terrible as Trump’s presidency.
attributes.title: Garbage

attributes.review: I got this app to see subway surfers , but then I downloaded it and it hacked my phone !!! I saw trumps weird face 😡😡 and ran !!! Anyway I highly DONT recommend this app🤪✨👁👅👁🧚🏻‍♀️🧚🏻‍♀️

attributes.review: Oh my god this app is poorly rendered. See I am an avid trump supporter but the way this makes my phone crash every time I use is deplorable.
